definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch

sentences.english: The loom is controlled by a system of stiff punch cards and hooks.
sentences.chinese: 織布機的控制裝置由硬打孔卡和吊鉤組成。

sentences.english: An iron pot, suspended from a crane, bubbled over the flame.
sentences.chinese: 一隻掛在吊鉤上的鐵鍋在火焰中燒得發響。

sentences.english: Roller chain models are available only in hook suspension.
sentences.chinese: 所有起重鏈都適用於吊鉤和吊耳。

sentences.english: QB type explosion-proof hook bridge crane work level is intermediate.
sentences.chinese: QB型防爆吊鉤橋式起重機工作級別爲中級。

sentences.english: In Area F, they have large hooks in the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: F區裏天花板上的吊鉤很大。

sentences.english: Our company produCes hook range, lifting sheave.
sentences.chinese: 我公司生產的吊鉤總成。

sentences.english: Then a man climbs the module and unfastens the cables of the crane.
sentences.chinese: 工人爬上模塊卸掉起重機的吊鉤。

sentences.english: Then compress it so one end of the hook joint slides over the other.
sentences.chinese: 然後再對其壓縮以至吊鉤接頭的端滑入另一端。

sentences.english: A cord that is drawn through eyelets or around hooks in order to draw together two edges.
sentences.chinese: 一種透過釦眼或吊鉤將兩邊拉在一起的繩索。

sentences.english: An overdoor shoe rack with hanging hooks can do the trick behind your door.
sentences.chinese: 拿吊鉤將鞋架掛在門上，這樣不就用上門後的空間嗎？

sentences.english: Horizontal steel tank lined with plastic hook from the top of the general set up.
sentences.chinese: 臥式鋼襯塑貯罐頂部一般設起吊鉤。

sentences.english: The welding on the girder web first before installation, transportation lashing hook.
sentences.chinese: 安裝前先將焊在主樑腹板上，運輸時捆綁用的吊鉤。

sentences.english: Hanging hook and bar clap on metal pipe should be fixed on load-carrying member.
sentences.chinese: 金屬排水管上的吊鉤或卡箍應固定在承重結構上。

sentences.english: The structure and working principle of new type of safety hook against dropping of sucker rod are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了新型抽油杆防脫安全吊鉤的結構和工作原理。

sentences.english: Top it off with the wooden crane with hook and swiveling action.
sentences.chinese: 頂它關閉的木製起重機吊鉤和旋轉動作。
